name: function-runner-vscode-extension
description: Function Runner let's you run individual functions from your IDE

commands.title: Clear saved Function Runner extension preferences

functionrunner.general.sourceFolder.markdownDescription: Specifies folder where source files are with relation to project root folder. If source is at root folder set empty string as value like ""

functionrunner.general.printFunctionExec.markdownDescription: Specify if code executing user's function is printed to the input view

enumDescriptions: Logs all errors, warnings, and messages
Logs all errors, warnings, and messages with extra context useful for debugging
functionrunner.logging.outputLevel.markdownDescription: Specifies how much (if any) output will be sent to the GitLens output channel

functionrunner.codeLens.enabled.markdownDescription: Specifies whether to provide any code lens.

functionrunner.terminalOptions.windowsTe.markdownDescription: Specify the Windows terminal to use
enumDescriptions: Your system uses Windows PowerShell to run commands
Your system uses Bash kind terminal to run commands
Your system uses Windows CMD to run commands

functionrunner.terminalOptions.windowsTe.markdownDescription: Specify absolutepath to the terminal executable

functionrunner.terminalOptions.linuxTerm.markdownDescription: Specify terminal to use in Linux
enumDescriptions: Your system uses Bash to run commands
Your system uses Bourne (sh) to run commands

functionrunner.terminalOptions.linuxTerm.markdownDescription: Specify absolutepath to the terminal executable or empty string if your default shell is supported

functionrunner.terminalOptions.macTermin.markdownDescription: Specify terminal to use in Mac
enumDescriptions: Your system uses zsh to run commands
Your system uses Bash to run commands

functionrunner.terminalOptions.macTermin.markdownDescription: Specify absolutepath to the terminal executable or empty string if your default shell is supported

functionrunner.javascriptRunOptions.comm.markdownDescription: Specifies things to add to the terminal execution command before the 'functionrunner.runOptions.executable'

functionrunner.javascriptRunOptions.envV.markdownDescription: Specifies environmental variables for when running ES module. Available variables are 'sourceFileDirAbsPath', 'tsConfigJsonFileAbsPath', 'tsNodeInstallationPath'. Surround vars with '{{' and '}}'
Specifies environmental variables for when running CommonJS module. Available variables are 'sourceFileDirAbsPath' and 'tsConfigJsonFileAbsPath'. Surround vars with '{{' and '}}'

functionrunner.typescriptRunOptions.comm.markdownDescription: Specifies things to add to the terminal execution command before the 'functionrunner.runOptions.executable'

functionrunner.typescriptRunOptions.envV.markdownDescription: Specifies environmental variables for when running ES module. Available variables are 'sourceFileDirAbsPath', 'tsConfigJsonFileAbsPath', 'tsNodeInstallationPath'. Surround vars with '{{' and '}}'
Specifies environmental variables for when running CommonJS module. Available variables are 'sourceFileDirAbsPath' and 'tsConfigJsonFileAbsPath'. Surround vars with '{{' and '}}'

functionrunner.typescriptRunOptions.tsco.markdownDescription: Specify relative path to tsconfig-file in relation to project's root path and the name of the file

functionrunner.debugger.address.markdownDescription: Specifies the address of the debugger

functionrunner.debugger.port.markdownDescription: Specifies the port of the debugger

scripts.test-dev: pnpm bundle-dependencies && pnpm bundle-extension-dev && pnpm build-tests && node ./out/tests/runTest.js
scripts.test-e2e: pnpm bundle-dependencies && pnpm bundle-extension-dev && pnpm build-tests && node ./out/tests/runTest.js
scripts.test-e2e-multiple-setups: pnpm bundle-dependencies && pnpm bundle-extension-dev && pnpm build-tests && node ./out/tests/runTestForMultipleSetups.js
scripts.package-extension-dev: pnpm clean && pnpm bundle-dependencies && pnpm bundle-extension-dev && vsce package --no-dependencies --out publish/
scripts.package-extension-prod: pnpm clean && pnpm bundle-dependencies && pnpm bundle-extension-prod && vsce package --no-dependencies --out publish/
